thread.title: Ecstasy therapy may help service veterans suffering PTSD

title: Ecstasy therapy may help service veterans suffering PTSD
text:
Ecstasy therapy may help service veterans suffering PTSD 01:29
Combining intensive psychotherapy with a pure form of the party drug ecstasy is safe and could aid recovery in people with post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), according to the findings of a study in military veterans. Edward Baran reports.
